attributes.action: prosecute each and every person who signs the petition to discriminate against the visit of our Pope.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The anti Catholicism in this country is palpable. It's a growing hatred for morality, a hatred of Christian values. And the Nation Secular Society's petition to publicly insult the Pope by snubbing him, is DISCRIMINATION on the basis of religion. Labour MADE these laws, so, it's a bit rich for the left wing to them COMPLAIN about other people's lifestyle and religious choices whilst lauding the benefits of anti discrimination laws!

rejection.details: Government does not prosecute individuals.  Your petition also reads as a statement of opinion as fact.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
